sourcesContent:
<template>
    
</template>



 <script>
import { defineComponent,ref,reactive } from 'vue';
import{getworkerMessage} from '../../api/api.js'


  export default defineComponent({
    setup  () {
      let userId = ref()
      let name = ref()
      let getid = localStorage.getItem("Userid");
      getworkerMessage(getid).then(
       response =>{
         if (response['code'] == 1){
           name.value = response['data'].name
           userId.value = response['data'].userId
         }
       })

    return {
       name,
       userId,
       getworkerMessage
    }}
    })
    </script>
